Package logic.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, HumanPlayer, Player.CopyOfPlayer, SocketPlayer
    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player in the game. Stores the player's hand.

      • getCopy

        public Player getCopy​(Game game)
        Returns a copy of the player using the CopyOfPlayer class. Copies each piece in the hand and adds it to a new list.
        Parameters:
        game - The game for the copied player to belong to.
        Returns:
        The copied player.
